summary: When a man meets a young girl in a parking lot he attempts to help her avoid a bleak destiny by initiating her into the beauty of the outside world. The journey shakes them in ways neither expects.
cast: Ross Partridge|Oona Laurence|Jess Weixler|Tom Bower|Scoot McNairy|Lindsay Pulsipher|Jennifer Lafleur|Joel Murray|Ron Burkhardt|Ketrick 'Jazz' Copeland|Iris Elliot|Amirah Griffin|Mark Kelly|John Kemp|Kay Kemp|Drew Langer|Robert Longstreet|Matt Oberg|Mackenzie Paige|Erin Kennedy Portress|Maggie Raymond|Betty Richardson|Jennifer Spriggs|Kathleen Vernon
keywords: cooking over a campfire|homesickness|11 year old|sleeping on the floor|road trip
title: Lamb
